original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 326.90/327.00 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 326.90/327.00 to the US dollar on Wednesday, from 326.90/327.00 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 was quoted at 13.70/80 percent from 13.75/85 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 was quoted at 13.80/90 percent from 13.75/85 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 was quoted steady at 14.05/10 percent.
The Colombo Exchange was trading up; with the All Share Price Index up 0.16 at 10,628; and the S&P SL20 up 0.23 percent at 3,059. (Colombo/Dec20/2023)
